open.title: Openserve Outage | Nahoon Beach
open.description: Openserve has informed us of a network outage affecting Nahoon Beach, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Openserve engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
